meanings.definition: A person who swims the backstroke.
meanings.sent1: The backstroker won the race with their smooth backstroke technique.
meanings.sent2: The backstroker practiced diligently to improve their backstroke time.
meanings.sent3: The backstroker joked that they could swim the backstroke in their sleep.
meanings.sent4: Watching the backstroker glide through the water was like witnessing poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The coach praised the backstroker for their elegant backstroke form.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the backstroke in swimming.
meanings.sent1: The backstroker goggles were specially designed for backstroke swimming.
meanings.sent2: The backstroker event at the competition showcased impressive backstroke skills.
meanings.sent3: The backstroker swim cap kept slipping off during the backstroke race.
meanings.sent4: The backstroker lane was marked with a sign indicating backstroke only.
meanings.sent5: The backstroker technique class focused on perfecting the backstroke stroke.
